item.description:
The final showdown has arrived! The never ending droid army and the grand army of the Battle Troopers have come to an epic conclusion. You will be briefed with updated intelligence from the battlefield on what has been happening in the war so far. Bonuses and extra supplies will be granted to the victors of the previous NERF battle. Who will come out on top in the end? Will the planet be ruled with a metal fist or will the Battle Troopers repel the metal invaders? Get your NERF blasters ready for a two hour battle event for ages 6 and up!

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember. Blaster lease available.
item.name: Buddy Night with NERF: Final Strike
